name: Yakuza Cat
description:
In the booming city of New Osaka one feline member of the local Yakuza is confronted with the gang's arch-nemesis: The viscious and canine Yaken-Gumi. With his favourite bar taken over by obscenely aggressive canines, the incredibly hungover mobster Nekoyama has sworn to reclaim his favourite bar and booze...and to teach the Yaken-Gumi some respect.

Made for the UE Projectweek 2021 Game Jam
